title: IPTCPhotoVideoMetadataAssertion
description: Stores IPTC Photo/Video metadata in JSON-LD form, referencing XMP fields for IPTC Photo/Video standards

@context.description: Should reference the IPTC XMP namespaces, e.g., Iptc4xmpCore, Iptc4xmpExt, dc, photoshop, plus, xmp, xmpRights, etc.

dc:title.description: A short textual title for the asset.

dc:description.description: A textual description of the asset's content.

dc:creator.description: Array of creator names (string). For more structured names, store them as separate fields or in an extended form.

photoshop:DateCreated.description: Creation date/time in textual or ISO 8601 format. e.g. '2022-08-31T10:00:00Z' or 'Aug 31, 2022'

photoshop:Credit.description: Credit line for how the asset should be publicly credited.

photoshop:Source.description: Name of the original source of the asset (e.g., 'Associated Press').

Iptc4xmpExt:PersonInImage.description: List of names or identifiers for persons depicted in the image/video.

Iptc4xmpExt:LocationCreated.description: Location metadata for where the asset was created/captured.

Iptc4xmpExt:City.description: City where the asset was created.

Iptc4xmpExt:ProvinceState.description: Province or state where the asset was created.

Iptc4xmpExt:CountryName.description: Country name of the asset's creation location.

Iptc4xmpExt:CountryCode.description: ISO country code for the creation location (e.g. 'US', 'FR').

xmpRights:UsageTerms.description: Terms under which the asset may be used.

xmpRights:WebStatement.description: A URL for the statement of usage rights.

plus:licensor.description: List of licensor objects providing details about who licenses the asset.
